title: client error during ranked champ selection
body:
so i was in queue and got into a team and a client error came up and now its stuck on enemy team selecting champ ban.

cant pick champ or anything but after a minute or so i was able to chat with team for a few sec....

now i ve got to wait for 5 minutes for not picking champ and leaving 

sigh

replies.body: Has this happened to you before?
It might have just been a queer drop in data transfer for a brief but vital moment. Is it still happening to you, so much that it's severely hindering your experience?
